WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I've just tried this library with WPF and it works just fine.. with .NET4.
For my project i had to use it with a .NET 3.5 WPF application and the QR code is just not displayed.

Any idea ?

Kind regards,

Guillaume
WorkItem.Summary: .NET 3.5 QrCodeImgControl does not display QR code

Comments.Message:
Hi,
I had similar problem I used .Net4 and everything was ok but when I tried to use .net45 QrCode didn't display. What I did a downloaded project from hare.  Rebuild it and used that dll and it worked. Before i used package from nugget and I think something is wrong there.

Regards

Dracomithril
